# [Interview #451: Mythmaker Films Interview, Entry #10](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=451#10)

#### Interviewer at Vroman's

How many times have you read the new book?

#### Stormleader

Twice. Just finished second time.

#### Interviewer

Wow. Two times, huh?

#### Stormleader

Two times.

#### Interviewer

Favorite scene?

#### Stormleader

Egwene. In the Tower, glowing with the Power. Hey, that rhymes.
